price: Sesungguhnya kami telah diberi ancaman dengan ini 1107 dan (juga) bapak-bapak kami dahulu; ini tidak lain hanyalah dongengan-dongengan orang dahulu kala".
arabic: لَقَدۡ وُعِدۡنَا هَٰذَا نَحۡنُ وَءَابَآؤُنَا مِن قَبۡلُ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: laqad wuʿid'nā hādhā naḥnu waābāunā min qablu in hādhā illā asāṭīru al-awalīna
